description: This file is a verification script for a FastAPI-based application to confirm that JWT/OAuth2 authentication has been removed. It contains functions to test application importability, OpenAPI security schemes, route security dependencies, environment variables, and router imports, ensuring that no security schemes or authentication dependencies remain in the application.

methods.name: test_import()
methods.description: Tests that the application can be imported successfully from src.api.main and outputs app details.

methods.name: test_openapi_spec()
methods.description: Checks the OpenAPI schema for presence of security schemes and global security settings to confirm they are absent.

methods.name: test_routes()
methods.description: Verifies that route definitions do not have security dependencies, ensuring no endpoints require authentication.

methods.name: test_env_example()
methods.description: Reads the .env.example file to confirm that JWT secrets or related variables are not present.

methods.name: test_router_imports()
methods.description: Imports various router modules to ensure they load without errors, implying they do not enforce authentication dependencies.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Runs all verification tests and summarizes whether JWT/OAuth2 authentication has been successfully removed.
